text.text: All programs are one year long in duration. Each program is divided into four quarters (12 weeks each). Classes are held once a week. In the initial stages, classes will be held only on Sundays. There will 3 sections of classes available, including Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Native and Mobile Web Computing, and Blockchain. Each class will be 3 hours in duration per week, for a total of 36 hours per quarter or 144 hours for the entire year.
